docs.title: Using the Odin IDE
docs.text: You can use the Odin IDE to execute code in different languages and add language dependencies and system packages

docs.title: Odin
docs.text: We are thrilled to anonune the launch of Odin a secure, scalable code execution engine that supports many programming languages, language dependencies and system packages.

docs.title: Introducing Odin
docs.text: Odin is a secure and scalable code execution engine that supports multiple programming languages along with their dependencies and system packages. Whether you are developing a competitive programming platform, an e-learning platform, an interview platform, or an online code editor, Odin can help you achieve your goals by providing efficient code execution capabilities for various workflows.

docs.title: What sets Odin apart
docs.text:
• Nix

    Odin utilizes Nix, one of the most powerful and feature-rich package managers, to help you specify language dependencies and system packages. This allows you to easily create your environments with all the necessary components.

    Read more

  • Platforms

    Odin supports multiple platforms, allowing you to run it in various ways. You can use it as a standalone binary on your system or run it in a container using Podman, Docker or similar tools.

    Read more
